xml.log: If there is an update when the file file is missing, go to Steam Client - Library List - mydockfinder - right-click menu - Properties - Local File - Verify software file integrity If the desktop icon is not displayed after enabling pre-stage scheduling, you can right-click on the desktop-view-display desktop icon to enable display desktop icon Changelog 1.Fixed the issue that the system could not completely hide the system tray after the previous version of Win11 22600 2.Optimized dock to minimize animation rendering anti-aliasing 3.Add multi-screen display to minimize window animation function 4.Added support in Bulgarian, thanks to the translation of the document provided by @Трифон Иванов 5.Fixed some other issues caused by the window closing animation in the previous beta version 6.Preferences add window to close animation-related settings, you can increase the window of the sorter, after this update the default is to turn off the window animation, need to open in preferences, add another three windows to close the animation effect, click to preview the corresponding animation effect, the last of which disappears animation GPU occupation is relatively high 7.Fix other issues (too long to forget what it is...)
